EYB:ForceStance.NAME: Force Stance
DESCRIPTION: Gain #yForce upon entering this stance.  While in this stance, you gain #b{0} Strength and lose #b{1} Dexterity and #b{1} Focus.  Upon exiting this stance: Gain #b(2) Temp HP next turn.

EYB:AgilityStance.NAME: Agility Stance
DESCRIPTION: Gain #yAgility upon entering this stance. While in this stance, you gain #b{0} Dexterity and lose #b{1} Strength and #b{1} Focus.  Upon exiting this stance: Draw #b(2) card next turn.

EYB:IntellectStance.NAME: Intellect Stance
DESCRIPTION: Gain #yIntellect upon entering this stance. While in this stance, you gain #b{0} Focus and lose #b{1} Strength and #b{1} Dexterity.  Upon exiting this stance: Deal #b(2) Elemental damage to ALL enemies next turn.
